20110106000955.000|20110106000957.000|TR0|SCOTT:  I'm not sure I would phrase it as 
20110106000957.000|20110106001000.000|TR0|a lack of sincerity.  I would simply say

20110106001004.000|20110106001006.000|TR0|(INAUDIBLE) ceiling that will be a 
20110106001006.000|20110106001009.000|TR0|separate vote unto itself.  For me to find

20110106001011.000|20110106001013.000|TR0|raising the ceiling will first start with 
20110106001013.000|20110106001015.000|TR0|finding the cuts.  If we don't have a

20110106002040.000|20110106002042.000|TR0|I've been at this for 25 years now and my
